text: The 2016 NCAA Division I women's soccer season was the 35th season of NCAA championship women's college soccer. The Penn State Nittany Lions were the defending national champions. == Changes from 2015 == === Conference realignment === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:80%; text- align:center; font-size:100%; text-align:left;" |- !School !Previous conference !New conference |- | Coastal Carolina | Big South Conference | Sun Belt Conference |- | Kansas State | No team | Independent |} ==
